General.Name: Kavango Resources PLC
General.Description: Kavango Resources Plc, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration of base and precious metals in Botswana. The company explores for nickel, copper, silver, platinum, iron, gold, uranium, and rare earth deposits. It owns 100% interest in the Kalahari Suture Zone project located in the southwestern of Botswana; and the Kalahari Copper Belt project located in northeast Botswana. The company also holds interest in the Ditau project consists of located in Southwestern Botswana. Kavango Resources Plc was incorporated in 2017 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 4460 Old Dixie Highway, Grant-Valkaria, FL, United States, 32949
